title: Local installation mlflow project error
body:
### System information
- **Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in MLflow)**:
- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**:
- **MLflow installed from (source or binary)**: 
- **MLflow version (run ``mlflow --version``)**:
- **Python version**: 2.7.13
- **npm version (if running the dev UI):
- **Exact command to reproduce**:

### Describe the problem
[root@datanode03 mlflow-master]# python setup.py install

### Source code / logs
Installed /usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/mlflow-0.2.1-py2.7.egg
Processing dependencies for mlflow==0.2.1
Searching for querystring_parser
Reading https://pypi.python.org/simple/querystring_parser/
Download error on https://pypi.python.org/simple/querystring_parser/: [SSL: CE
RTIFICATE_VERIFY_FAILED] certificate verify failed (_ssl.c:661) -- Some packages may not be found!Reading https://pypi.python.org/simple/querystring-parser/
Download error on https://pypi.python.org/simple/querystring-parser/: [SSL: CE
RTIFICATE_VERIFY_FAILED] certificate verify failed (_ssl.c:661) -- Some packages may not be found!Couldn't find index page for 'querystring_parser' (maybe misspelled?)
Scanning index of all packages (this may take a while)
Reading https://pypi.python.org/simple/
Download error on https://pypi.python.org/simple/: [SSL: CERTIFICATE_VERIFY_FA
ILED] certificate verify failed (_ssl.c:661) -- Some packages may not be found!No local packages or download links found for querystring_parser
error: Could not find suitable distribution for Requirement.parse('querystring
_parser')
